metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9955 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The get_build_id function in opncls.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file in which a certain size field is larger than a corresponding data field, as demonstrated by mishandling within the objdump program.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9955` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-common - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-for-build - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-for-host - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mips-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsel-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa32r6-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa32r6el-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-mipsisa64r6el-linux-gnuabin32 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-multiarch - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnuspe - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-source - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1

binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.29-1ubuntu1
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.29-1ubuntu1
libbinutils - 2.29-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> PoC in bug report leosilva> fix for this issue causes a serious regression in xenial in arm64 and armhf

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29-1ubuntu1').
